Text: Is it a single file or what? how do i mount it to a dvd so that when i play it i can choose subtitles?

@kev0188 , 
Open up the avi-file in a decent player, like VLC, and it will run the subs auto :)

Varför gör inte ALLA på det här sättet? (multisubs)

Tackar!

To make best DVD use Nero or a program like it,all are free, and this changes the avi file to vob,etc files like on a reg. DVD. then just put the sub files with the same title as avi file except for the ext which you put.srt and the program will combine the two because the address is the same.
